bug.author: fkromer
bug.description: For recoverable estimator persistence scikit-learn recommends to use (instead of ). Sidenote: It is possible to export trained models into ONNX or PMML but the estimators are not recoverable. For more info refer to <denchmark-link:https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/model_persistence.html>here</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fkromer>@fkromer</denchmark-link> can you please provide a sample file?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lutzroeder>@lutzroeder</denchmark-link> Thanks a lot for the fast response. How can I share an exemplary with you?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/fkromer>@fkromer</denchmark-link> Small files: Zip and drag into the response field. Large files: Upload to cloud drive and share link.
We donâ€™t support that file type with a GIF, JPEG, JPG, PNG, DOCX, GZ, LOG, PDF, PPTX, TXT, XLSX or ZIP. I've shared the example file (device tree model) for 7 days: <OBSOLETE_LINK>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lutzroeder>@lutzroeder</denchmark-link> Would be great if you got the example that I can get rid of it on my file share.
Dragged the file into the Netron window and seeing this... <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/438516/88153476-50500b00-cbba-11ea-80ec-12f0d7e7c794.png></denchmark-link>
